member.name: TF_LBBALLOONINFO
member.summary: The TF_LBBALLOONINFO structure contains information about a language bar balloon item.

member.name: TF_LBBALLOONINFO.style
member.summary: Contains one of the values that specify the type of balloon to display.

member.name: TF_LBBALLOONINFO.bstrText
member.summary: Contains a BSTR that contains the string for the balloon. This string must be allocated using the SysAllocString function. The caller free this buffer when it is no longer required by calling SysFreeString.
